description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of labeled digraphs with n nodes and k arcs and without directed paths of length >=2, with 0 <= k <= floor(n^2/4).
formula: G.f. for n-th row: Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n, k)*((1+x)^k-1)^(n-k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 04 2003E.g.f.: Sum(exp(y*((1+x)^n-1))*y^n/n!, n = 0 .. infinity). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 28 2004
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 08 2000
